ingredients.ingredient: ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

cookingTips: Cook peas according to package directions and reserve some cooking liquid to adjust consistency while mashing
Mash peas to desired texture; some prefer smooth and creamy while others like a bit of texture from whole peas
Fold in heavy cream gently after mashing to keep the dish light and airy rather than dense
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user achieve the perfect balance between creamy and textured for traditional British mushy peas.
